response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. Given its unique features and quality, we are confident that you will find immense satisfaction in owning this product.

We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, which we believe reflects the generous nature of our offer and our commitment to making this product accessible to you.

Please consider this offer carefully and let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We are here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
